translators.translators.OpenDSSAdapter¶

class translators.translators.OpenDSSAdapter(network, injections)¶

Bases: PowerflowSimulator

Converts from the common network to PandaPower networks and solves using Pandapower simulations

Parameters:

  • network (class:Network.Network) – Common network element to be simulated

  • injections (class:'injections.Injection', optional) – Common injection element that stores time data regarding loads and generators, defaults to None

__init__(network, injections)¶
